content: this is a summary of a civil case heard in the klaipeda district court the court has decided to dissolve the marriage between the applicant and the defendant due to their faults the property acquired during the marriage will be divided as follows the applicant will receive a vehicle a ½ share of an apartment and a ½ share of a land plot the defendant will receive a personal property right a ½ part of the apartment and a ½ part of the land plot the court also ruled that the creditor obligations from a credit agreement will remain the joint responsibility of both parties
